name: Very Stable Nuclear Reactor That Definitely Won't Blow Up
name_original: Very Stable Nuclear Reactor That Definitely Won't Blow Up
description:
Build your Nuclear energy empire with zero chance that anything will blow up probably maybe!

Put together your system to generate power, do your research, and sell your power so you can get even more power

WASD/Arrow keys to pan

Unlock mouse pan with Y

Navigate menu to choose object to place then click to place

Choose delete then click to sell

Hook up the systems correctly to generate power and sell it to nearby cities.

Power your research stations to generate research and buy upgrades.

POWER SETUP IS -> CORE ($200) HEAT -> BOILER($100) GAS -> TURBINE($100) POWER -> TRANSFORMER($50)

BOILER MUST BE CONNECTED TO A COOLER VIA FLUID PIPE

AND TURBINE MUST BE CONNECTED TO COOLER VIA GAS PIPE

BASIC SETUP BELOW

 MORE SCREENSHOTS ON LUDUM DARE PAGE
